name: apply_patch
description:
Apply a unified patch to one or more files.

Format:
*** Begin Patch
*** Update File: path/to/file
@@ anchor line copied from file
 context line (space-prefixed)
-line to remove
+line to add
 context line
*** End Patch

Guidance:
- Use exact context lines from current file content.
- Keep anchors unique when possible.
- If patch context fails, re-read file and rebuild patch from current content.
- For full rewrites or repeated patch failures, prefer {{tool:write}}.

Examples:
- {{tool:apply_patch}}({"patch": "*** Begin Patch\n*** Update File: a.js\n@@ function f() {\n-  return 1;\n+  return 2;\n }\n*** End Patch"})

Returns: ok: N file(s) changed, +additions -removals

feedback.patch_context_not_found:
ERROR: @@ context line not found in file. Common causes:
1. @@ has multiple lines (WRONG) - must be ONE single line
2. @@ is blank or partial (WRONG) - must be complete line from file
3. Line was modified since last read
ACTION: Call {{tool:read}}({{target}}), then COPY a unique line VERBATIM for @@. For small files, use {{tool:write}} instead.
feedback.patch_context_not_unique:
FORMAT ERROR: {{tool:apply_patch}} failed: patch context not unique.
ACTION: Call {{tool:read}}(path) for {{target}}, then retry {{tool:apply_patch}} with MORE unique context lines, OR switch to {{tool:edit}} / {{tool:write}} if the file is small.
feedback.must_read_before_patching:
FORMAT ERROR: {{tool:apply_patch}} failed due to stale context.
ACTION: Call {{tool:read}}(path) for {{target}}, then retry {{tool:apply_patch}} with current context lines.
feedback.invalid_patch_format:
FORMAT ERROR: {{tool:apply_patch}} failed: invalid patch format.
ACTION: Provide a COMPLETE patch with *** Begin Patch and *** End Patch markers and valid context lines. Re-read the target file and retry {{tool:apply_patch}}.
feedback.unexpected_patch_line:
FORMAT ERROR: {{tool:apply_patch}} failed: unexpected patch line.
ACTION: Ensure each line starts with ' ', '+', or '-' and include a valid @@ context header. Re-read the target file and retry {{tool:apply_patch}}.
feedback.invalid_add_line:
FORMAT ERROR: {{tool:apply_patch}} failed: invalid add line.
ACTION: Lines being added must start with '+'. Re-read the target file and retry {{tool:apply_patch}}.
feedback.patch_file_not_found:
FORMAT ERROR: {{tool:apply_patch}} failed: file not found in patch header.
ACTION: Use {{tool:ls}}(path) or {{tool:glob}}(pat, path) to locate the correct file path, then retry {{tool:apply_patch}} with the correct '*** Update File:' path.
